text: @hellolanemoore @anxious_e Don’t worry bb a giant portion is getting sick-then infecting others. I personally sleep better knowing I did my part. I’m not going out for fun, no parties, or fuckin with a hot guy- to risk bringing back covid19- that might kill my family. Stay home when possible ur doin good!
